summary: THIS 2000 TOWN & COUNTRY HAS HAD NUMEROUS PROBLEMS WITH ITS DRIVE TRAIN/DRIVE SELECTOR. THE RECENT HAS BEEN THE FOLLOWING CASE THAT HAS OCCURED TWICE IN THE LAST MONTH WITH NO REACTION FROM CHRYSLER DAIMLER DUE TO LOCAL DEALER NOT BEING KNOWLEDGEABLE OF PROCESSES TO REGISTER OCCURANCE.    THE VEHICLE, WHEN PARKED, WITH ENGINE TURNED OFF, AND KEYS OUT OF THE IGNITION, COMES OUT OF GEAR AND ROLLS OUT OF THE DRIVEWAY BY ITSELF, WITH NO ONE IN THE VEHICLE.  HAS SPOKEN WITH CHRYSER-DAIMLER AND THEY ARE SENDING AN INDEPENDENT ENGINEER TO INVESTIGATE WITHIN 72 HOURS.
